title: क्या चीन के मार्शल आर्ट कलाकारों ने ‘जय हो’ गाने पर नृत्यकला का प्रदर्शन किया?
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
CLEVER! I don’t believe that JAI HO! was really the soundtrack of this spectacular show in China. But it’s fascinating to see mass choreography performed with such incredible precision. Could be computer graphics. Anybody know if it’s real?

 No matter, well worth a WATCH. #JaiHopic.twitter.com/TEFCsLFuZ8
